translation.en: OPTIMUS: Before time began, there was the Cube.
translation.zh: 在宇宙出现之前 有一个立方体

translation.en: We know not where it comes from,
translation.zh: 我们不知道它来自何处

translation.en: only that it holds the power to create worlds
translation.zh: 只知道它能令世界变化

translation.en: and fill them with life.
That is how our race was born.
translation.zh: 这就是我们这个种族的诞生

translation.en: For a time, we lived in harmony,
translation.zh: 长期以来我们生活和谐相处

translation.en: but like all great power, some wanted it for good, others for evil.
translation.zh: 像所有伟大的力量一样 有些好善 有些好恶

translation.en: And so began the war,
a war that ravaged our planet until it was consumed by death,
translation.zh: 战争蹂躏了我们的星球 荼毒生灵

translation.en: and the Cube was lost to the far reaches of space.
translation.zh: 立方体也遗失在太空中

translation.en: We scattered across the galaxy,
hoping to find it and rebuild our home,
translation.zh: 希望寻找并重建我们的家园

translation.en: searching every star, every world.
translation.zh: 搜寻每一座星球 每个世界

translation.en: And just when all hope seemed lost,
translation.zh: 当所有的希望似乎都落空

translation.en: message of a new discovery drew us
translation.zh: 一个新发现信息将我们引到

translation.en: to an unknown planet called Earth.
translation.zh:
一个未知的星球…
地球

translation.en: But we were already too late.
Oh, God, five months of this.
I can't wait to get a little taste of home.
A plate of mama's alligators etouffee.
translation.zh: 吃一盘妈妈烧的海鲜配青菜

translation.en: You've been talking about barbecued 'gators and crickets
translation.zh: 几星期来 你一直唠叨

translation.en: for the last two weeks. I'm never going to your mama's house, Fig. I promise.
translation.zh: 烧烤鳄鱼和蟋蟀 打死我也不去你妈家 菲格

translation.en: But Bobby, Bobby, 'gators are known to have the most succulent meat.
translation.zh:
-我保证
-鲍勃 鳄鱼肉可香呢

translation.en: I understand.
English, please. English.
translation.zh: 请说英语 说英语 说过多少遍

translation.en: I mean, how many times have we...
translation.zh: 说英语 说过多少遍

translation.en: We don't speak Spanish. I told you that.
Why you got to ruin it for me, man? That's my heritage.
translation.zh: 干嘛不让我说？ 这是我的传统

translation.en: Go with the Spanish. Whatever.
Hey, you guys remember weekends? Huh?
The Sox at Fenway.
translation.zh: 芬威体育场红袜队球赛

translation.en: Cold hotdog and a flat beer. Perfect day.
translation.zh:
-凉热狗和无泡啤酒
-难忘的一天

translation.en: What about you, Captain? You got a perfect day?
I just can't wait to hold my baby girl for the first time.
translation.zh: 我真等不及抱我的女儿

translation.en: FIG: He's adorable. EPPS: That's too...
Shut up!
EPPS: Hey, I'm ready to do this.
Hey, any of y'all grow some balls,
come see me on the court, man.
LENNOX: Hey, hey!
Watch this crossover, baby.

translation.en: Like Jordan in his prime, pushing through the front line.

translation.en: Step aside, ladies. Oh, man. What?
Lennox! Hey, what are you doing?

Are you gonna help me with the gear?

translation.en: Raptors one and two, snap to heading two-five-zero to intercept.

translation.en: Bogie is in the weeds ten miles out, not squawking.

translation.en: Unidentified aircraft, we will escort you to US SOCCENT airbase.

不明飞行物 我们将引导你
进入美国特种兵空军基地

你如果不服从
我们将使用致命武力

Tail 4500 X-ray.

translation.en: SOLDIER: Bogie's five miles out, sir.
My wife on? SOLDIER: Yes, Captain.
(EXCLAIMING) My ladies! Look.
Oh, my goodness. Look at her. She's getting so big.
Look at those cheeks. I just wanna chew on them.
translation.zh:
小脸蛋…
我真想咬一口

translation.en: Baby, we made a good-looking kid.

translation.en: I know that people say that all the time,

translation.en: She has your laugh.
(BABY GURGLING) She laughed? Her first one, yeah.
You sure she didn't just fart?
No, she's a lady.

translation.en: (CRYING) She doesn't know you yet, but she will.

translation.en: 4500 X. Something's not right.
MAN ON PA: Bogie's on the deck.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Radar's jammed.
It's coming from the chopper.
Will? Sarah?
Hey, Sarah, if you can hear me,
I love you and I'll be home soon.
translation.zh: 我爱你 很快就回家

translation.en: To the right. Go to the right. Check fire.
MH-53 pilot, power down now.
Have your crew step out or we will kill you.

否则将被我们消灭

translation.en: SOLDIER: Hold your fire! Stand by to engage!
My God.
They bombed the antenna farm! We're under attack!

translation.en: Go! Move! Move!
It's going after the files!
Cut the hard lines!
I need a key! It's locked!
Move! Move!
Here, come here! Come here!
Here, hide in here!
Oh, my God. Okay.
No!
What the...
Epps, let's go!
HOSNEY: Okay, Mr. Witwicky, you're up.
SAM: Sorry, I got a lot of stuff.
(WHISPERING) Watch.
Okay.
For my family...
(STUDENTS LAUGHING) Who did... Who did that? People! Responsibility.
translation.zh:
谁在捣乱？同学们！
对自己的行为负责

translation.en: Okay.
So, for my family genealogy report,
I decided to do it on my great-great-grandfather,
who was a famous man, Captain Archibald Witwicky.
translation.zh: 他是一个名人 威维基船长

translation.en: Very famous explorer.
In fact, he was one of the first
translation.zh: 他是第一组探险者之一

translation.en: to explore the Arctic Circle, which is a big deal.
translation.zh: 他是第一组探险者之一 进入北极圈 这是件大事

translation.en: In 1897, he took 41 brave sailors straight into the Arctic Shelf.
translation.zh:
在1897年
他带领41名勇敢的水手 进入北极陆架

translation.en: SAILOR: Move faster, men! Move! Chop! Heave!
The ice is freezing faster than it's melting! Chop faster! Heave, men!

translation.en: Heave! No sacrifice, no victory!
translation.zh: 快砍！快！ 没有牺牲就没有胜利！

translation.en: We'll get to the Arctic Circle, lads!
So that's the story, right?
And here we have some of the basic instruments and tools
used by 19th-century seamen.
(ALL LAUGHING)
This here is the quadrant, which you can get for 80 bucks.
translation.zh: 这是象限仪 售价80元

translation.en: It's all for sale, by the way.
(STUDENTS CHUCKLING) Like the sextant here. $50 for this, which is a bargain.

translation.en: These are pretty cool. These are my grandfather's glasses.

translation.en: I haven't quite gotten them appraised yet, but they've seen many cool things.

translation.en: HOSNEY: Are you going to sell me his liver?

translation.en: Mr. Witwicky, this isn't show and sell. It's the 11th grade.

translation.en: I don't think your grandfather would be
particularly proud of what you're doing.
I know. I'm sorry. I just, you know, this is all going towards my car fund.

translation.en: You can tell your folks. It's on eBay. I take PayPal.

translation.en: Cold hard cash works, too.
And the compass makes a great gift for Columbus Day.
translation.zh: 罗盘是哥伦布纪念日的绝佳礼物

translation.en: HOSNEY: Sam! Sorry.
Unfortunately, my great-great-grandfather,
the genius that he was, wound up going blind and crazy in a psycho ward,

translation.en: drawing these strange symbols
and babbling on about some giant ice man
(SCHOOL BELL RINGING) that he thought he'd discovered.

好了！明天可能有突击测验！
也许没有！

translation.en: Sleep in fear tonight. Here, you want? Here, 50. 40? 30?
translation.zh:
-今晚带着恐惧入睡！
-五十元？四十元？

translation.en: Sam? Yeah. Sorry, sorry.
Okay. Pretty good, right?
I'd say a solid B-.
A B-? You were hawking your great-grandfather's crap
translation.zh:
-B减？
-你只想卖你曾祖父的垃圾

translation.en: in my classroom. No, kids enjoy...
Look, can you do me a favor? What?
Can you look out the window for a second? You see my father?
translation.zh: 看看窗外 看见我父亲没有？

translation.en: He's the guy in the green car. Yeah.
Okay, I wanna tell you about a dream. A boy's dream.

translation.en: And a man's promise to that boy.
He looked at me in the eye. He said, "Son, I'm gonna buy you a car.
translation.zh: 他看我的眼睛 他说 儿子 你只要拿回两千元

translation.en: "But I want you to bring me $2,000 and three As."

translation.en: Okay? I got the 2,000 and I got two As.
Okay? Here's the dream. Your B-. Pfft! Dream gone. Kaput.

这是我的梦想
给我B减 我没法圆梦了 完蛋了

translation.en: Sir, just ask yourself, what would Jesus do?

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes.
So?
A-. It's an A, though.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. I can't see. It's an A.
So I'm good? You're good.
I got a little surprise for you, son.

Yeah, a little surprise.
No. No, no, no, no. Dad!

translation.en: Yeah. I am. You're not getting a Porsche.

What's wrong with you? You think I'd really get you

-你怎么了？
-你以为一上来就能驾保时捷

translation.en: a Porsche for your first car?

-你怎么了？
-你以为一上来就能驾保时捷 第一辆车是保时捷？

(LAUGHING) Oh, come on. It's just a practical joke.

我像你这么大时 -开四轮加一台引擎就够

No sacrifice, no victory. Yeah, no victory. You know, I got it.

That practically makes us family.
Uncle Bobby B, baby. Uncle Bobby B.
Sam. Sam, let me talk to you.

Let me tell you something, son.

translation.en: Especially not in front of my mammy.
That's my mammy. Hey, Mammy!
Oh, don't be like that. If I had a rock, I'd bust your head, bitch.

translation.en: I tell you, man, she deaf, you know?

translation.en: This ain't bad.
This one's got racing stripes. Yeah.

Manny! What?

-但是喷漆都要褪色了

-这是你的第一部车

translation.en: Kid, come on, get out. Get out the car.
No, no, no. You said cars pick their drivers.
Well, sometimes they pick a driver

-比人更伟大…

translation.en: Steve.
Hello, Mr. Secretary.
They're so young.

NSA's recruiting right out of high school these days.

translation.en: Guys, that's the Secretary of Defense.

translation.en: I am so underdressed.
Ladies and gentlemen, the Secretary of Defense.

translation.en: Please be seated.
I'm John Keller.
Obviously, you're wondering why you're here,

translation.en: so these are the facts.
At 1900 local time yesterday,
translation.zh: 昨天在当地时间傍晚七点

translation.en: the SOCCENT Forward Operations Base in Qatar was attacked.

translation.en: So far as we know, there were no survivors.

translation.en: The objective of the attack was to hack our military network.

translation.en: We're not sure exactly what they're after,
translation.zh: 尚不清楚他们还想要什么

translation.en: but we do know that they were cut off during the assault,
translation.zh: 在这次进攻战斗中… 敌方已被阻

translation.en: which would lead us to assume that they're going to try it again.
translation.zh: 我们认为… 他们还会再来

translation.en: Now, no one's taken responsibility for the attack.
And the only real lead we have so far is this sound.
translation.zh: 我们目前唯一的线索 就是这个声音

translation.en: That's the signal that hacked our network.

translation.en: NSA's working at full capacity to analyze it

translation.en: but we need your help to find out who did this.

translation.en: Now, you've all shown considerable ability
in the area of signals analysis.
We're on a hair-trigger here, people.

translation.en: This is as real as it's ever gonna get.

Good luck to us all.
All right, Mojo. I got the car. Now I need the girl.

translation.en: It's like clockwork.
All right, I know you get wasted on these things,

translation.zh:
我不要黄金配套！
艾普斯！国防部！

translation.en: Give me a status.
Sir, we're tracking a Special Ops team under fire in Qatar.
translation.zh: 我们查到特种兵… 在卡塔尔受袭

translation.en: They say they're survivors of the base attack. Survivors?
translation.zh:
-他们说是上次的幸存者
-幸存者？

translation.en: I ain't never seen this in my life!
translation.zh: 我从来没见过这种东西

translation.en: Need gunships on station ASAP!
SERGEANT: Predator's coming up in a minute.
We're linking the call to the nearest AWACS.
translation.zh: 接通机载报警与控制系统

translation.en: Unknown, man. I don't... Man, if you seen this shit...
translation.zh: 你们要是看见这玩意儿

translation.en: Predator ETA two minutes.
translation.zh: 掠夺者大约两分钟后到

translation.en: Hey! Make way!
What is that? I don't know.
We need air support and we need it now.
Roll in strike package Bravo on unknown target.
I authenticate Tango Whiskey at time 0300 Zulu.
MAN 1: Attention, all aircraft.
This will be a danger close-fire mission.
translation.zh: 这将是一次近距离交战

translation.en: MAN 2: Weapons, I just got a call from Falcon Ops.
Who's closer to Kill Box One Alpha?
Send the Hogs, sir. Okay, send the Hogs over
translation.zh:
-派进疣猪
-派疣猪进一号战区

translation.en: to Kill Box One Alpha. It's a danger close...
translation.zh: 派疣猪进一号战区 派疣猪进一号战区

translation.en: MAN 3: Switch the Hogs to Kill Box One Alpha, 300 feet danger close.
translation.zh: 派疣猪进一号战区 距离270米 非常接近

translation.en: PILOT: Friendlies in the area.
Seven-man team north of orange smoke!
Received Kill Box One Alpha. Engage hostile.
translation.zh: 进入一号战区 与敌军交火

translation.en: Attack direction west! You're clear and hot!
translation.zh: 向西攻击！你方无障碍就绪

translation.en: Strike, tell me status of Hog right now. Hog One-One Dark Star status.
translation.zh: 出击 疣猪状况 疣猪一号黑星

translation.en: Lennox! The heat's coming! Laze the target!
translation.zh:
-莱诺斯 硬仗开始了
-标出目标

translation.en: We got a beam-rider incoming! Laze target!
translation.zh: 光波导弹即将进入！标出目标！

translation.en: Ready! Heat's coming! What? Bring it!
PILOT: Receiving radar jamming in vicinity of target.
LENNOX: No frigging way that thing's still not down.
Spooky Three Two, use 105 shells. Bring the rain.
translation.zh: 32号机 用105炮弹 强力攻势！

translation.en: PILOT: Be advised, ground team is requesting 105 sabot rounds.
translation.zh: 地面部队要求发射 105镗片

translation.en: Did we lose them? SERGEANT: Warthog One confirm visual on friendlies.
translation.zh:
-失去联络？
-疣猪一号 确认盟军视野

translation.en: LENNOX: Where's Fig?
Fig? Fig? FIG: Oh, God!
God damn it! Get a medic! Get a medic!
FIG: I'm sorry. EPPS: Black Hawk...
translation.zh:
我们找医护员 -对不起
-黑鹰…

translation.en: We'll get a medic. Just hold on. He's got a pulse.
Bring them home.
You get those men stateside right now.
I want them debriefed in 10 hours.
translation.zh: 我要他们十小时后汇报战况

translation.en: MAGGIE: There's only one hacker in the world who can break this code.
translation.zh: 世上只有一个黑客 能破译密码

translation.en: Hey! Hey, hey, hey! Wait! Stop!
I am sorry to bother you.
Maggie? Listen, I need your help.
No! This is my private area, my place of Zen and peace.
translation.zh:
这是我的私人空间
静修打禅的地方

translation.en: Listen to me. GRANDMA: Glen! Who is it?
Shut up, Grandma!
What are you doing here? Just give me a break, will you, please?
(GRANDMA SHOUTING) Grandmama! Drink your prune juice!
translation.zh: 奶奶 喝你的李子汁吧！

translation.en: Oh! What level are you on, man? Six.
Oh, here come the matrix! Here come the matrix!
Glen, seriously, don't you want to see something classified?
translation.zh: 格兰 你不想看机密的东西吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Get low.
Here we go. Here we go. Double tap.
translation.zh: 低下 跳起来 点地两次

translation.en: Hey, I just paused it. I just paused it.
Hey. I need a moment.
Please. MAGGIE: Sorry.
Hey, man, save my game.
How classified?
Like "I will go to jail for the rest of my life for showing you" classified.
translation.zh: 我要是告诉你 就要吃一辈子牢饭

translation.en: Yes! One quick peek.
Special Ops got a thermal snapshot of whatever hit the base in Qatar.
translation.zh: 特种兵拍到了 击中基地的感热图像

translation.en: I want to see it. Well, the imager was damaged, sir.
The rangers are en route with the imager,
but we also have a security issue.
Circle logs indicate one of the analysts made a copy
of the network intrusion signal.
The signal strength is through the roof.
Where did you say you got this?
It hacked the national military air-guard frequency
translation.zh: 它不到一分钟 就打入国家空军警卫队频率

translation.en: in less than a minute.
translation.zh: 就打入国家空军警卫队频率

translation.en: No way. Yeah.
Looks like there's a message embedded in the signal.
translation.zh: 信号内… 藏有一则信息

translation.en: Let me work my magic.
"Project Iceman"?
What's Sector Seven? Who is Captain Witwicky?
(SHUSHING) Are you playing those video games again?
Cops! Cops!
FBI! Clear right!
AGENT: Lock it down! Lock it down!
OMAR: Cops!
Lock it down.
Wait! I'm just a cousin! I'm just a...
Get off my Grandmama's carpet! She don't like nobody on the carpet!
translation.zh: 别踩地毯！ 奶奶最讨厌

translation.en: Especially police!
REPORTER ON TV: It was an awesome spectacle here an hour ago
translation.zh: 一小时前的景象令人叹服

translation.en: when over 40 C-17s lifted off of this very base.
We're not told where they're going.
translation.zh: 我们还不清楚它们要去哪里

translation.en: Morning, Mo.
translation.zh: 我们还不清楚它们要去哪里 早上好 舟舟

translation.en: The government has been very quiet about what's going on but in our...
translation.zh:
政府部门对所发生的事
保持缄默 舟舟 舟舟

translation.en: Mojo. Mojo. They were headed directly
translation.zh: 舟舟 舟舟 直到北韩

translation.en: (BARKS) towards North Korea.
Stop with the barking, Mojo. It's too early. Please?
Miles? Miles, listen to me. Listen.
My car, it stole itself, okay? What are you talking about, man?
translation.zh:
-我的车自己偷开跑掉了
-你在说什么？

translation.en: Satan's Camaro. In my yard. It's stalking me.
translation.zh: 该死的魔鬼车！中了邪来盯我！

translation.en: Stop!
No, no, no, no, no, no.
(SHOUTING)
(GROANING) Sam?
Hi.
That was... That was really awesome.
(GROANING) Well, it felt awesome. Are you okay?
I'm not okay, all right? I'm losing my mind a little bit.
translation.zh: 没事 只是头脑不大对劲

translation.en: I'm getting chased by my car right now. I got to go.
translation.zh: 我被自己的车追 我要走了

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna catch up with you guys later.
translation.zh: 我被自己的车追 我要走了 改天跟你聊

translation.en: Oh, great. Cops.
Officer!
Listen!
Oh, that hurt.
Listen to me!
Thank God you're here! I've had the worst day ever!
translation.zh: 谢天谢地你在这儿！我今天好惨！

translation.en: I've been... I've been followed here on my mother's bike! Right?
translation.zh: 我骑妈妈的脚踏车来这里

translation.en: And my car's right there and it's been following me here!
translation.zh: 我的车跟踪我来这里！ 它跟着我来到这里

translation.en: So get out of the car!
(ENGINE ROARING) No! Stop! Oh, God. Okay, okay! Okay, all right!
translation.zh:
天啊 好吧 好了！好了！对不起！
我不是故意撞你的车！

translation.en: Okay! I'm sorry! I'm... I didn't mean to hit your car! Look!
translation.zh:
好了！好了！对不起！
我不是故意撞你的车！

translation.en: Okay, look, look, look! Stop, stop!
Please! Okay, what do you want from me?
Okay.
Oh, God, no! No!
Oh, shit! Oh, shit, shit, shit! Oh, God! Oh, shit!
It's a bad dream.
Are you username LadiesMan217?
translation.zh: 用户名女人迷217是不是你？

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about! Are you username LadiesMan217?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-用户名女人迷217是不是你？

translation.en: Yeah. Where is eBay item 21153?
Where are the glasses?
Get back!
Stop!
God!
What is your problem, Sam?
Okay, there's a monster right there! It just attacked me!
Here he comes! All right, get up.
translation.zh: 他来了！ 起来！快起来跑！

translation.en: Get up and run! You have to run! Okay.
Sam, what is that thing?
You have to get in the car. Get in. I don't want to. Get in the car. Trust me. Trust me! Sam.
Get in! Go, go, go, go, go.
Go, go, go, go!
Oh, God! We're gonna die! We're gonna die!
No, we're not. No, we're not gonna die.
Oh, my God! Trust me. He's a kick-ass driver!
translation.zh:
-天啊！
-相信我！他绝对是驾车高手！

translation.en: Oh, my God! No!
We're gonna die!
Oh, my God!
We're locked in.
(CAR PASSING) The car won't start. At least we ditched the monster, right?
translation.zh: 车不会启动 至少我们甩掉了怪物！

translation.en: Okay.
Time to start.
He's got me! Oh, God!
He's going to kill me!
No. No, no, no!
Get off!
Kill it! Kill it! Get it, get it, get it, get it!
Not so tough without a head, are you?
translation.zh: 没有头看你还怎么威风？

translation.en: Here, come on.
MIKAELA: What is it?
It's a robot.
But like a...
Like a different... You know, like a super-advanced robot.
translation.zh: 好像是 一种超级先进的机器人

translation.en: It's probably Japanese.
Yeah, it's definitely Japanese.
What are you doing?
I don't think it wants to hurt us.
It would have done that already.
Really? Well, do you speak robot?
Because they just had, like, a giant droid death match.
I think it wants something from me. What?
Well, 'cause the other one was talking about my eBay page.
translation.zh: 另一个 问我网上拍卖的事

translation.en: You are the strangest boy I have ever met.
translation.zh: 我从没见过你这么怪的男生

translation.en: SAM: Can you talk? ANNOUNCER: XM Satellite Radio...
(RADIO CHANNELS SWITCHING) Digital cable brings you...
...Columbia Broadcasting System...
So you... You talk through the radio?
Thank you, you're beautiful. You're wonderful, you're wonderful.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你真美！ 真优秀！

translation.en: So, what was that last night? What was that?
Message from Starfleet, Captain...
Throughout the inanimate vastness of space...
translation.zh: 来自巨大的太空 好像那来自

translation.en: Angels will rain down like visitors from heaven! Hallelujah!
Visitors from heaven? What... What are you, like, an alien or something?
translation.zh: 天堂的访客？你是外星人吗？

translation.en: Any more questions you want to ask?
He wants us to get in the car.
And go where?
Fifty years from now, when you're looking back at your life,
translation.zh: 五十年后 你回顾人生

translation.en: don't you want to be able to say you had the guts to get in the car?
translation.zh: 难道不想说 你有胆量进车里吗？

translation.en: This car's a pretty good driver.
I know.
Why don't you go sit in that seat, there?
I'm not going to sit in that seat. He's driving. Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我才不坐 他在开车
-是的

translation.en: You're right.
Well, maybe you should sit in my lap.
translation.zh: 也许你应该坐在我大腿上

translation.en: Why?
Well, I have the only seat belt here. You know, safety first.
translation.zh: 只有我有安全带 安全第一

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Right?
Yeah. Okay.
There, see? That's better.
Okay. Okay.
You know, that seat belt thing was a pretty smooth move.
translation.zh: 用安全带当借口 很聪明哟

translation.en: (CHUCKLING)
Thank you.
You know what I don't understand?
Why, if he's supposed to be, like, this super-advanced robot,
does he transform back into this piece-of-crap Camaro?
translation.zh: 为什么会变成这辆破雪佛莱？

translation.en: SAM: Whoa! Whoa!
Oh, see? No. Get... No, that doesn't work. See?
MAN: Move it, you moron! Great, now... See?
Fantastic.
Now you pissed him off.
That car is sensitive.
I mean, $4000 just drove off.
translation.zh: 付了四千元就这样开走了

translation.en: What?
This is you...
Oh, my God!
Come on, let's go.
This is the coolest thing I've ever seen! Explosions everywhere!
translation.zh: 真是最好玩的东西！ 到处都是爆炸！

translation.en: This is easily a hundred times cooler than Armageddon. I swear to God!
translation.zh: 比电子游戏 好玩多了！

translation.en: Fire, fire, fire, fire!
Whoa! Sweet!
Oh, dude, I hope this guy's got asteroid insurance,
'cause he is so boned!
What is that?
There's something in the tree, dude.
No, there's something in the thing by the tree!
Could you guys just give me a space rock?
translation.zh: 能不能给我一块太空石？

translation.en: Excuse me, are you the tooth fairy?
translation.zh: 对不起 你是牙齿大仙吗？

translation.en: Hey, sweetheart, what are you doing out here by yourself?
translation.zh: 甜心 你在外面做什么？

translation.en: Holy God! What happened to the pool?
translation.zh: 老天 游泳池怎么了？

translation.en: Are you Samuel James Witwicky,
descendent of Archibald Witwicky?
They know your name.
Yeah.
My name is Optimus Prime.
We are autonomous robotic organisms from the planet Cybertron.
translation.zh: 我们是来自塞伯坦星球的 自治机器人生物体

translation.en: But you can call us Autobots for short.
Autobots.
What's cracking, little bitches?
OPTIMUS: My first lieutenant. Designation, Jazz.
translation.zh: 我的中尉 代号：爵士

translation.en: JAZZ: This looks like a cool place to kick it.
What is that? How did he learn to talk like that?
We've learned Earth's languages through the World Wide Web.
translation.zh: 我们从万维网上 学会了地球语言

translation.en: My weapons specialist, Ironhide.
You feeling lucky, punk? Easy, Ironhide.
translation.zh:
-你感觉还好吧 小痞子？
-别紧张 铁皮

translation.en: Just kidding. I just wanted to show him my cannons.
(SNIFFING) OPTIMUS: Our medical officer, Ratchet.
The boy's pheromone level suggests he wants to mate with the female.
translation.zh: 该男成长激素水平显示 他想与女性交配

translation.en: You already know your guardian, Bumblebee.
(RAP MUSIC PLAYING) Bumblebee, right?
translation.zh: 大黄蜂？ 想要知道我的声誉 绝对独一无二

translation.en: BUMBLEBEE: ♪ Check on the rep Yep, second to none ♪
translation.zh: 想要知道我的声誉 绝对独一无二

translation.en: So you're my guardian, huh?
His vocal processors were damaged in battle. I'm still working on them.
translation.zh: 他的机械喉在战斗中受损 我在设法修理

translation.en: Why are you here?
We are here looking for the All Spark.
And we must find it before Megatron.
translation.zh: 一定要赶在威震天前面

translation.en: Mega-what?
OPTIMUS: Our planet was once a powerful empire, peaceful and just,
translation.zh: 我们的星球曾经威力无比 和平且正义

translation.en: until we were betrayed by Megatron,
leader of the Decepticons.
All who defied them were destroyed.
translation.zh: 谁对他们不服从马上遭到灭顶之灾

translation.en: Our war finally consumed the planet,
translation.zh: 我们的战争最终令星球毁灭

translation.en: and the All Spark was lost to the stars.
translation.zh: 所有的火种源都消失在众星球中

translation.en: Megatron followed it to Earth, where Captain Witwicky found him.
translation.zh: 威震天跟着来到地球 威维基船长找到了他

translation.en: My grandfather.
It was an accident that intertwined our fates.
translation.zh:
一次偶然事件
导致我们的命运急转弯

translation.en: Come back!
I think the dogs have found something.
translation.zh: 狗儿肯定发现了什么东西

translation.en: The ice is cracking!
Captain! Grab my rope, Captain!
I'm all right, lads!
Can we throw you a rope, Captain?
translation.zh: 船长 能不能给你丢一根绳子？

translation.en: Megatron crash-landed before he could retrieve the Cube.
translation.zh: 威震天 在找到立方体前紧急着落

translation.en: Men! We've made a discovery!
translation.zh: 弟兄们！我们发现了东西！

translation.en: He accidentally activated his navigation system.
translation.zh: 船长无意中引发了他的导航系统

translation.en: OPTIMUS: The coordinates to the Cube's location on Earth were imprinted on his glasses.
translation.zh: 立方体位置的坐标 于是印在了他的眼镜上

translation.en: How'd you know about his glasses?
eBay. eBay.
If the Decepticons find the All Spark,
translation.zh: 如果霸天虎找到了火种源

translation.en: they will use its power to transform Earth's machines and build a new army.
translation.zh:
他们就会利用其威力 将地球上所有的机器
变成一支新的军队

translation.en: And the human race will be extinguished.
Sam Witwicky, you hold the key to Earth's survival.
translation.zh:
山姆 你手上有最重要的东西
关系到地球的存亡

translation.en: Please tell me that you have those glasses.
It's like a self-regenerating molecular armor.
translation.zh: 他就像某种会自生的分子装甲

translation.en: Look at the scorch mark where the sabot round hit.
Melted right through.
translation.zh: 立刻熔化 这些镗片是否能抵御

translation.en: Hey, aren't sabots hot-loaded for, like, a 6,000-degree magnesium burn?
translation.zh: 这些镗片是否能抵御 6000度高温？

translation.en: Close to it. It melts tank armor.
translation.zh: 差不多 能熔化坦克装甲

translation.en: So this metal skin must react to extreme heat.
translation.zh: 这种金属对极高温能做出反应

translation.en: Heads up! Oh!
I thought you said that thing was dead, man!
Strap it down! Strap it! This thing is wicked.
All right, get on the horn with Northern Command.
translation.zh: 告诉北方指挥 用高温镗片攻击

translation.en: Tell them that our effective weapon is high-heat sabot rounds.
translation.zh: 在所有 战斗机上装载！

translation.en: Recommend we load them on all the gunships. Go.
translation.zh: 建议我们装载到武装直升机上 去吧

translation.en: You want that piece?
Okay, Maggie, look.
Let me break it down to you how it's gonna happen.
They gonna come through that door and be good cop, bad cop.
translation.zh: 会跑来 假装黑白脸

translation.en: Don't fall for that, all right? That's why I ate their food.
translation.zh: 别受骗 所以我才吃他们的

translation.en: See, they put the plate of donuts out here to test your guilt.
If you don't touch it, you're guilty.
translation.zh: 你不吃说明你有罪恶感

translation.en: I ate the whole plate. The whole plate. Okay?
It's me and you.
They walk through that door, you don't say nothing.
translation.zh: 他们进来 什么都别说

translation.en: She did it! She did it! She's the one you want! All right?
I was just sitting at home watching cartoons,
playing video games with my cousin, and she came in there.
translation.zh:
和表兄打电动 -然后她就进来了
-格兰 少发神经

translation.en: And then... Glen, you freak.
translation.zh:
-然后她就进来了
-格兰 少发神经

translation.en: Hey! I am not going to jail for you or anybody else!
I have done nothing bad my entire life!
Hey, man, I'm still a virgin.
Okay, so what?
translation.zh: 还是处男身呢！ 那又怎样？

translation.en: I've downloaded a couple of thousand songs off the Internet.
translation.zh: 上网下载过… 几千首歌

translation.en: Who hasn't? Who hasn't?
I promise! Glen, shut up!
No, you shut up! Don't talk to me! Don't talk to me, criminal!
translation.zh:
-格兰 闭嘴！
-你闭嘴 别跟我讲话 罪犯！

translation.en: Oh, sugar rush. This is... This is not his fault.
See? So can I go home now?
Oh, okay. I won't. But just listen to me.
Okay, whoever hacked into your military system downloaded a file, all right?
translation.zh: 无论是谁黑入你们军事系统 下载一份文档

translation.en: It was something about someone named Witwicky
translation.zh: 有关一个叫威维基的人

translation.en: and some government group, right? Named Sector Seven.
translation.zh: 以及某个政府组织名为第七部

translation.en: You have to let me talk to Defense Secretary Keller
before you go to war with the wrong country!
Whatever fell out of the sky ended up right behind...
translation.zh: 天上落下的东西都掉在这里

translation.en: What did he say? What?
Did he hear it, too? Yeah, Jack heard it, too. Yeah.
What does he think it is? He thinks it's a military experiment.
What a knucklehead. Yeah, well, I think it's a plane.
Still no official word as to what happened. You can see...
Yeah! Call Sam.
Yeah. Why? He should be home in 15 minutes.
translation.zh:
-他15分钟后应该会回家
-我过15分钟打

translation.en: Well, I'll call him in 15 minutes.
translation.zh:
-他15分钟后应该会回家
-我过15分钟打 如果你过15分钟打

translation.en: If you wait 15 minutes, he'll be late and you'll have to ground him.
translation.zh: 那就迟了 你就得将他禁足

translation.en: Well, I can't ground him if he's not late, can I?
translation.zh: 他要是没迟回我就不能将他禁足

translation.en: I need you to stay here, all right? You got to stay here and you're gonna watch them.
Okay, okay. All of them.
translation.zh:
-好
-全部的 -听见我说的吗？
-是的 好

translation.en: Five minutes, all right?
Thanks for staying on my path. Oh, yeah. No, no, Dad. Hey!
translation.zh:
-多谢使用小径
-是的 爸爸

translation.en: The... Oh, the path. I'm sorry. I forgot about the path.
I'm gonna sweep the whole thing right now. How about that?
You know, I buy half your car... Yeah.
translation.zh: 我帮你付了一半买车费

translation.en: ...then I bail you out of jail and then I just decided to do all your chores.
translation.zh: 把你从监狱保释出来 现在帮你做家务

translation.en: The chores. Yeah. Life is great, huh?
Life... Life is fantastic, is how good it is.
It's so... Oh, the trash cans. Sorry, Dad. I'm gonna do the trash cans now.
translation.zh: 对了 垃圾 对不起 爸爸

translation.en: No, no, I don't want you to strain yourself.
translation.zh:
-我现在就去倒垃圾
-别弄脏衣服

translation.en: No, no, I won't strain myself, Dad.
translation.zh: 不会 要是让你做我会过意不去

translation.en: I'll do it. It would hurt my feelings if you do it.
translation.zh:
-我倒不介意
-不 我去做吧

translation.en: You sure? I don't mind, I don't... I promise...
No, no, no, I'm gonna do it.
translation.zh: 不 我来做 我去倒垃圾 清理烤肉架

translation.en: I'm gonna do the trash cans and I'm gonna scrape the grill
translation.zh: 我去倒垃圾 清理烤肉架

translation.en: and I'm gonna... I'm gonna sweep up the whole house right now.
Tonight, right now? Right now.
The...
I love you. God, I love you
just so much right now.
You know, Mom wanted me to ground you.
You're three minutes late. Right?
Oh, well, just another thing you did for me, Dad,
translation.zh: 你又帮了我大忙了 爸

translation.en: because you're such a swell guy.
One more thing, huh?
All right, I love you! Sleep good, handsome man!
translation.zh: 我爱你！好好睡 英俊大叔！

translation.en: What are you doing? What are you doing?
No, watch the path! Watch the path!
Watch the... Please, please, please.
No, no, wait. No, no, no! Oh, no!
OPTIMUS: Oops. Sorry. My bad. Oh, I... You couldn't...
You couldn't wait for five... You couldn't wait for five minutes?
I told you to just stay! Just stay! God!
I told you to watch them. I told you. Okay, you know what?
They seem to be in a little bit of a rush. (BARKING) Oh, this is bad. No!
Mojo, Mojo! Off the robot! God!
Oh, wet. No, no, no, no, no! Easy! Easy!
translation.zh: 恶心！好湿！ 别！别急 慢慢来！这是舟舟

translation.en: Hold on! Hold! This is Mojo.
translation.zh: 别！别急 慢慢来！这是舟舟

translation.en: This is Mojo. He's a pet of mine.
translation.zh: 别！别急 慢慢来！这是舟舟 舟舟是我的宠物

translation.en: He's a pet. Okay? That's all.
translation.zh: 舟舟是我的宠物 他只是一个宠物

translation.en: If you could just put the guns away...
translation.zh: 他只是一个宠物 把枪放下

translation.en: Put the... Put them away. Please.
IRONHIDE: You have a rodent infestation.
A what? Shall I terminate?
No, no, no, no. He's not a rodent, he's a Chihuahua.
translation.zh: 它不是老鼠 是一只奇娃娃

translation.en: This is my... This is my Chihuahua. We love Chihuahuas! Don't we?
He's leaked lubricants all over my foot.
translation.zh: 它漏出的润滑剂弄湿了我的脚

translation.en: He peed on you? Bad Mojo. Bad Mojo!
translation.zh:
它在你脚上撒尿？ -舟舟坏蛋！坏蛋！
-坏蛋舟舟

translation.en: Bad Mojo!
I'm sorry. He's got a male dominance thing.
translation.zh: 抱歉 它有点大男子主义

translation.en: That's all it is.
My foot's gonna rust. All right.
Okay, okay.
Shut up and go hide! Just hurry.
Autobots, recon.
RON: I hope he's okay. He's in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 但愿他没事 正在厨房里

translation.en: Got some ice on his nose.
I had to slap him around a little bit.
You did not.
You didn't even ground him. Almost, almost.
translation.zh:
-你根本就没有罚他
-也差不多

translation.en: Where are they? No, no, no, no, no.
Come on, come on.
SAM: What? What is this? OPTIMUS: Time is short.
translation.zh: 什么？这什么？ 时间有限

translation.en: They really want those glasses.
Come on. What are you doing? I'm gonna help you. Okay.
Please hurry. SAM: Okay.
Yeah, no, no. It's definitely gone. What do you mean?
My glasses were in the bag.
translation.zh: 眼镜本来在我的背包里

translation.en: They were in the backpack and now the backpack isn't here.
Well, they're gonna be pissed, so what do you wanna do?
So what I think you should do is you should...
translation.zh: 你最好… 你最好彻底搜这边

translation.en: You should check this whole... This whole section here.
Just give it a clean sweep, and I'll get the corner here.
translation.zh: 翻个底朝天 我去角落找

translation.en: Yeah, no, no, no. Not there. That's my... That's my private...
translation.zh: 不 不是那里 那里是我的私人

translation.en: Sorry. That's nothing. You just...
You just told me to look... I know,
translation.zh:
-没什么
-你让我 我没让你翻我的藏宝箱

translation.en: but I didn't mean to look inside of my treasure chest.
translation.zh: 我没让你翻我的藏宝箱 你应该早讲清楚

translation.en: MIKAELA: You should be way more specific so I don't get in trouble in your room.
I'm already stressed out enough.
SAM: Okay. What now?
No. No, no. No, no, no.
This isn't hiding. This isn't hiding.
This is my backyard, not a truck stop.
translation.zh: 这里是我家后院 不是卡车站

translation.en: Oh, God. Oh!
Okay, I saw it. The UFO landed right here and now it's gone.
translation.zh: 我看见 飞碟刚才明明落在这里 现在没了

translation.en: My moped's under there, man! Who's gonna pay for that?
translation.zh: 我的机动脚踏车放在那边 谁来赔？

translation.en: Sam? Sam, Sam, Sam, Sam.
He's back here. I can't deal with this. I can't...
This is my mother's flower... Oops.
Okay, listen. You got to listen to me.
translation.zh: 听我说 我父母要是出来看到你 非要吓死

translation.en: If my parents come out here and see you, they're gonna freak out.
translation.zh: 我父母要是出来看到你 非要吓死

translation.en: My mother's got a temper, okay?
We must have the glasses.
I know you need the glasses. I've been looking everywhere.
translation.zh: 我知道你需要眼镜 我找了

translation.en: They're not here. They're definitely not here.
Keep searching.
I need you to be quiet for five minutes.
Ten minutes. Okay?
translation.zh: 你们安静五分钟 十分钟 好吗？

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you. You got to... You're making a racket.
I can't concentrate. You want me to look and I'm hearing...
Calm down, calm down.
translation.zh:
-我不能专心
-冷静一点 你要想办法

translation.en: You got to do something here. You got to do something here.
Autobots, fall back. Thank you. Please, for five minutes.
translation.zh: 汽车人 撤退 拜托 五分钟

translation.en: Good? Good? Okay.
Move! Get away!
What's the matter with you? Can't you be quiet? He wants us to be quiet.
translation.zh: 你们怎么了？不能安静吗？

translation.en: Earthquake! Move, move, move, move, move! Earthquake!
translation.zh: 地震！ 快跑！快跑！地震了

translation.en: Judy! Judy, get under the table! Move it!
Duck and cover right now! How did you get over there so fast?
translation.zh:
-起来！
-你怎么这么快就跑过去？

translation.en: Wow! That was tingly!
You got to try that! Yeah, that looks fun.
RON: Sam? JUDY: Sammy?
What the hell is that? I don't know.
Sam? That's weird.
Sam! OPTIMUS: Ratchet, point the light.
Come on, hurry. SAM: Listen, we got a major issue in here.
What's with the light? You gotta stop the light.
translation.zh:
-快！
-我们这里出了大问题了 灯光怎么回事？不要再闪了

translation.en: What's going on? Turn it off. You gotta tell him to shut it off.
translation.zh:
关掉 -关上
-山姆 你在吗？

translation.en: Shut it off. RON: Sam, are you in there?
How come the door's locked?
You know the rules. No doors locked in my house!
translation.zh: 你知道家规 在家不许锁门！

translation.en: You know he'll start counting
if you don't open the door! One more chance. Five...
Oh, dear.
Four. It's coming off the hinges, pal. He's counting!
Sam, just open the door. Three.
Oh, my. Two.
He's counting. Stand back.
What's up? What's with the bat?
RON: Who were you talking to? I'm talking to you.
JUDY: Why are you so sweaty and filthy?
translation.zh: 你干嘛一身臭汗 脏兮兮？

translation.en: I'm a child. You know, I'm a teenager.
We heard voices and noises and we thought maybe you were...
translation.zh: 我们听到吵闹声 以为…

translation.en: It doesn't matter what we thought. What was that light?
translation.zh:
我们怎么想不重要 -那是什么灯光？
-什么灯光？没有灯光 爸爸！

translation.en: No, what light? What? There's no light, Dad! There's no light!
translation.zh:
-那是什么灯光？
-什么灯光？没有灯光 爸爸！

translation.en: You got two lights in your hand! That's what it is.
translation.zh:
-那是什么灯光？
-什么灯光？没有灯光 爸爸！ 门下面有灯光

translation.en: Maybe it bounced... There was light under the door.
translation.zh:
-闯进…
-门下的灯 你不能随便闯进我的房间

translation.en: Look, you can't... You can't just bounce into my room like that.
translation.zh: 你不能随便闯进我的房间

translation.en: You got to knock. You got to communicate.
We knocked for five minutes. I'm a teenager.
We knocked. You didn't knock.
You were screaming at me, okay? No.
This is repression, what you're doing here.
You're ruining my youth, okay? Oh, for Pete's sakes!
You are so defensive! Were you masturbating?
translation.zh: 你真会无理辩三分！你在打飞机吗？

translation.en: Judy. Was I...
No, Mom. Zip it, okay?
It's okay. No, I don't masturbate!
That's not something for you to bring up.
That's a father-and-son thing, okay? Father-son thing.
translation.zh: 那是父子之间的话题 别提那件事

translation.en: I mean, you don't have to call it that word
if that makes you uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 你自己嫌难为情就别说了

translation.en: You can call it Sam's happy time or...
translation.zh: 你可以说成是山姆的快乐时光或者

translation.en: Happy time? ...my special alone time...
Stop. Mom. Judy, stop. ...with myself.
translation.zh: 得了 朱蒂 别说了

translation.en: Mom, you can't come in and... I'm sorry.
It's just been a weird night. I've had a little bit to drink.
translation.zh: 今晚的事都有点怪 可能我喝多了

translation.en: No, no, Dad. Yeah, well, we saw a light.
Oh, parents.
I don't know where it was, but we saw it.
translation.zh: 不知从哪里传来 但我们看见了

translation.en: Earthquake! It's another one! Another earthquake! Get in the doorway!
translation.zh: 地震又来了 快躲进门廊！

translation.en: JUDY: Okay! Aftershock! Aftershock!
Oh, I hate these.
Got to ride it out. Ride it out! Quick, hide. JUDY: Hey, the lights are back on. Hide? What?
Where? Come on, get out of that tub.
RON: Can't you take safety seriously?
Good Lord, this floor is filthy, Sam. Oh, oh, man! Man. Oh.
translation.zh: 这地板真够脏的 天啊

translation.en: Oh, no! Look at the yard. The yard is destroyed.
translation.zh: 天啊 看看这院子 全完了

translation.en: Judy? Better call the city. We got a blown transformer!
translation.zh:
朱蒂 快打给市政府
我们这里变压器坏了

translation.en: Power pole's sparking all over the place!
Oh, man. Yard's a waste.
translation.zh: 哎哟 院子彻底毁了

translation.en: Trashed. Gone.
It's a wash. The whole yard. JUDY: You're kidding.
The parents are very irritating. RATCHET: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Can I take them out?
translation.zh: 父母亲生气了 我处理了他们吧？

translation.en: Ironhide, you know we don't harm humans.
translation.zh: 你知道我们不伤害人类

translation.en: What is with you?
translation.zh:
你知道我们不伤害人类 -你怎么搞的？
-需要也行 这是一种选择

translation.en: Well, I'm just saying we could. It's an option.
translation.zh:
-你怎么搞的？
-需要也行 这是一种选择

translation.en: We heard you talking to somebody, Sam.
translation.zh: 山姆 我们听到你跟谁在讲话

translation.en: We wanna know who. Mom, I told...
translation.zh:
-我们想知道是谁
-妈 我告诉过

translation.en: Hi. I'm Mikaela.
I'm a... I'm a friend of Sam's.
Gosh, you're gorgeous. Isn't that the prettiest girl?
translation.zh: 哎哟 你真漂亮！她很迷人吧？

translation.en: She can hear you talking, Mom.
Thank you.
translation.zh: 她都听到你说的话了 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. I'm sorry you had to hear our little family discussion about...
translation.zh: 抱歉刚才让你听到了 我们家人谈话

translation.en: RON: Sorry that we're bugging you. Do you have my backpack?
translation.zh:
我们家人谈话 -我的背包呢？
-在厨房里

translation.en: Come on, hon. Let's go. Oh, it's in the kitchen.
Oh, yes. Okay. Okay.
Yeah. Your mom's so nice.
I want you to distract my parents
while I slip out and get these glasses to them, okay?
Ronald Wickity? It's Witwicky. Who are you?
translation.zh:
-罗纳德威维特？
-我姓威维基 你是谁？

translation.en: We're the government. Sector Seven.
Never heard of it. Never will.
Your son's the great-grandson of Captain Archibald Wickity, is he not?
translation.zh: 你儿子是阿奇博威维特的曾孙？

translation.en: It's Witwicky.
May I enter the premises, sir?
Ron, there's guys all over the front yard.
translation.zh: 朗 前院站了一大群人

translation.en: What the heck is going on here? Your son filed a stolen car report last night.
translation.zh:
-怎么回事？
-你儿子报警车被盗

translation.en: We think it's involved in a national security matter.
translation.zh: 我们认为事关国家安全

translation.en: JUDY: They're ripping up my rose bushes! National security? That's right. National security.
My God, Ron, they're everywhere.
translation.zh: 朗 这群人全进来了！

translation.en: There's guys in suits all around the house! Look at this!
translation.zh: 穿西装的人 把房子围起来了

translation.en: Could you stay off the grass?
Get me a sample and some isotope readings.
They're pulling bushes out of the ground!
Good Lord! They've got to get their hands off my bush!
translation.zh: 老天 不能让他们碰我的植物！

translation.en: Drop the bat, ma'am. Hey, hey, hey, that's my...
I'm carrying a loaded weapon.
But you'd better get those guys out of my garden
or I am gonna beat the crap out of them!
Are you experiencing any flu-like symptoms? Aching joints? Fever?
translation.zh: 这是你的感冒症状吗？ 关节疼痛？发烧？

translation.en: JUDY: No! What is this?
translation.zh: 关节疼痛？发烧？ 怎么回事？

translation.en: How you doing, son? Is your name Sam?
translation.zh: 你好 年轻人？你是山姆？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I need you to come with us. Whoa, way out of line.
Sir, I am asking politely. Back off.
translation.zh: 先生 我礼貌地请您后退

translation.en: You're not taking my son. Really?
You gonna try to get rough with us? No, but I'm gonna call the cops
translation.zh:
-想跟我们动粗？
-不 但我们要报警

translation.en: because there's something fishy going on around here.
Yeah. There's something a little fishy about you, your son,
translation.zh: 修理这群可疑分子 真正可疑的是你 你儿子

translation.en: your little Taco Bell dog and this whole operation you got going on here.
translation.zh: 你家的狗 和整个行动

translation.en: What operation? That is what we are gonna find out.
translation.zh:
-什么行动？
-我们到时候就会知道

translation.en: I think direct contact.
Son? SAM: Yeah.
Step forward, please. Just stand?
Fourteen rads.
Bingo! Tag them and bag them!
If you hurt my dog, I'll kick your ass!
translation.zh: 你敢害我家狗儿 我跟你拼命！

translation.en: SIMMONS: Get me a sample on that vegetation ASAP!
RON: Sam! Do not say anything, Sam!
Yeah. Not a word until we get a lawyer!
So,
LadiesMan217.
That is your eBay username, right?
translation.zh: 是你的网拍的用户名吧？

translation.en: Yeah, but, you know, it was a typo and I ran with it.
translation.zh: 对 我偶然输入错误 就将错就错

translation.en: What do you make of this? My name is Sam Witwicky, okay? And my...
translation.zh:
-这里是什么意思？
-我叫山姆威维基

translation.en: Is that you?
Yeah, that sounds like LadiesMan.
Last night at the station, you told the officer your car transformed.
translation.zh: 昨晚在警局 你告诉警官说你的车会变形

translation.en: Enlighten me. Well, here's what I said, okay?
'Cause this is a total misunderstanding that my car had been stolen...
translation.zh: 误会了 我的车被偷了

translation.en: Really? ...from me, from my home,
but it's fine now because it's back! It came back!
Well, not by itself. Well, no.
Because cars don't do that because that would be crazy.
translation.zh: 因为汽车不会这样做 因为那样就等于在瞎说

translation.en: That's funny. That is so funny.
So what do you kids know about aliens, huh?
translation.zh: 你们这帮小毛头对外星人懂多少？

translation.en: Oh, you mean, like a Martian? Like what, E.T.? No.
translation.zh: 好像火星人？还是像ET电影？

translation.en: It's an urban legend. Yeah.
You see this?
translation.zh: 看见这个了？ 我有这个想干什么都行

translation.en: This is an I-can-do- whatever-I-want and- get-away-with-it badge.
translation.zh: 我有这个想干什么都行 我要把你们关一辈子

translation.en: Right. I'm gonna lock you up forever.
Oh, God. You know what? Don't listen to him.
translation.zh: 永远 别理他 他生气…

translation.en: He's just pissy 'cause he's got to get back to guarding the mall.
translation.zh: 因为他要回商场当保安

translation.en: You, in the training bra, do not test me.
translation.zh: 你这个黄毛丫头 别跟我耍贫嘴

translation.en: Especially with your daddy's parole coming up.
What? Parole?
It's nothing. Oh, grand theft auto, that ain't nothing?
translation.zh:
-什么？假释？
-没什么 偷车贼？没什么？

translation.en: You know those cars my dad used to teach me to fix?
Well, they... They weren't always his.
You stole cars?
Well, we couldn't always afford a babysitter,
so sometimes he had to take me along.
She's got her own juvie record to prove it!
She's a criminal. Criminals are hot.
translation.zh: 她是罪犯 坏女生都辣

translation.en: That'd be a real shame if he had to rot in jail the rest of his natural life.
translation.zh: 你爸要是 在牢里烂掉就可怜喽

translation.en: It is time to talk!
Big! It's big!
Go, go, go, go!
I can't see it! I can't see it!
Shift your weight towards the front! All right! All right!
(ALL SHOUTING)
You A-holes are in trouble now.
translation.zh: 你们这帮混蛋该倒霉了

translation.en: Gentlemen, I want to introduce you to my friend,
translation.zh: 各位 我来介绍你们认识我的朋友

translation.en: Optimus Prime.
OPTIMUS: Taking the children was a bad move.
Autobots, relieve them of their weapons.
translation.zh: 汽车人 撤下他们的武器

translation.en: Freeze!
Whoa! Whoa! Give me those!
Hi, there.
You don't seem afraid. Are you not surprised to see us?
translation.zh: 你好像不害怕 看见我们不觉得意外？

translation.en: Look, there are S-Seven protocols, okay?
translation.zh: 我们第七部有办事章程

translation.en: I'm not authorized to communicate with you
except to tell you I can't communicate with you.
translation.zh: 只限于告诉你我不能跟你沟通

translation.en: Get out of the car. All right.
Me? You want me to get... Now! All right, all right. Get out. Hey.
All right, I'm... I'm getting out. I'm getting out. You see?
translation.zh: 好吧 我下车 现在就下来

translation.en: Very nifty how you put us down without really killing us.
translation.zh: 能饶我们的命 就算不错了

translation.en: You're good with handcuffs, too, now, huh?
SIMMONS: How you doing?
You weren't supposed to hear all that. How's it going, huh?
translation.zh: 你本不该知道我爸的事

translation.en: Yeah. This is real.
Now, listen. If I choose to engage with him, mum is the word, all right?
translation.zh: 这是真的 如果我决定跟他讲话

translation.en: Sam, I have a record because I wouldn't turn my dad in.
translation.zh: 我有案底 是因为我没有举报爸爸

translation.en: When have you had to sacrifice anything in your perfect little life?
translation.zh: 你衣食不愁 需要牺牲什么？

translation.en: Big guys. Big guys with big guns, huh?
What is Sector Seven? Answer me.
translation.zh:
第七部是什么？ -回答我！
-这里只能由我发问

translation.en: I'm the one who asks questions around here. Not you, young man!
translation.zh:
-回答我！
-这里只能由我发问 不是你 年轻人

translation.en: How'd you know about the aliens? Where did you take my parents?
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道外星人的事？
-我父母呢？

translation.en: I am not at liberty to discuss it. No?
Hey. You touch me, that's a federal offense.
Do-whatever-you-want and- get-away-with-it badge, right?
Yeah. Brave now all of a sudden,
with his big alien friend standing over there.
Where is Sector Seven? Wouldn't you like to know?
Hey!
OPTIMUS: Bumblebee, stop lubricating the man.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 不要给这些人喷润滑剂

translation.en: Get that thing to stop, huh?
All right, tough guy, take it off.
What are you talking about?
Your clothes, all of it, off. For what?
For threatening my dad.
Little lady, this is the beginning of the end of your life.
translation.zh: 小姐 你的好日子的尽头要开始了

translation.en: You're a criminal.
Let's face facts. It's in your gene pool.
Those are nice. Now get behind the pole.
translation.zh: 不错嘛 站到电线杆子后面

translation.en: All right. This is such a felony, what you're doing.
I will hunt you down, okay? He'll hunt you down.
Without any remorse! No remorse.
Enjoy. Okay?
We have got to alert everyone.
translation.zh:
-我们要警告所有的人
-他们已经知道了

translation.en: They already know. Speaker.
translation.zh:
-我们要警告所有的人
-他们已经知道了 扬声器

translation.en: IRONHIDE: Optimus! Incoming!
Roll out.
PILOT 1: Okay, I'm picking up rad readings under that bridge right down there.
translation.zh: 我能从雷达看到 桥下的动静

translation.en: Okay, I'm getting really good rad readings. Forty-two and higher.
Up you get.
PILOT 2: Okay, we're dropping in.
Really strong readings right down below us. There he is.
Ship one and two, come on in.
translation.zh: 一号二号战机 回复

translation.en: That's it, right there. Mark him, mark him.
translation.zh: 就在那里 对准目标

translation.en: Okay, there he is. 11:30. 11:30. Right off the nose.
translation.zh: 他在那里 就在正前方

translation.en: I got it. 12:00.
Okay, I'm tracking him. I've got him.
Got him going down the street.
Okay. Where'd he go, guys? I lost him.
Got no IR signature. Where'd he go?
translation.zh: 没有红外线信号 他跑去哪里？

translation.en: Okay, I lost him. I lost him.
Okay, we're coming around.
OPTIMUS: Easy, you two.
No! No! No, Sam! Sam, don't drop me!
Sam, don't! Sam, don't! I'm slipping! I'm slipping!
translation.zh: 山姆 不要！我滑下来了！

translation.en: OPTIMUS: Hold on! No!
Sam!
All right, we've got him pinned.
We've got him pinned in the river.
I'm in for the shot.
Stop! Stop!
Wait! No!
Take the shot, get him. Take the shot.
No!
No! Stop!
Stop!
AGENT: Get down on the ground! Get down! Get down!
What? Okay.
Look, he's not fighting back!
COMMANDO 1: Freeze it! Freeze it! Freeze it!
Stop hurting him!
COMMANDO 2: Don't let him move!
I got him here!
No!
Happy to see me again?
Put him in a car with his little criminal friend.
translation.zh: 把他和他的罪犯朋友关进车里

translation.en: I want that thing frozen and ready for transport!
translation.zh: 给我把那东西冷冻然后运走！

translation.en: JAZZ: Hang back. Let me check it out.
Optimus,
are we just gonna stand here and do nothing?
OPTIMUS: There's no way to free Bumblebee without harming the humans.
translation.zh: 不伤害人类 就救不出大黄蜂

translation.en: But it's not right. He... Let them leave.
The Chinese and the Russians are nearing our area of operations
translation.zh: 中国和俄罗斯 进入

translation.en: in the western Pacific.
We feel like this could get out of hand real fast.
But the next couple of hours may just define his presidency.
translation.zh: 接下来数小时 会全看总统的了

translation.en: US and Chinese task forces approaching 100 nautical miles
translation.zh: 美中两国的军力 正向巡航导弹 100英里处推进

translation.en: of cruise missile range.
translation.zh: 正向巡航导弹 100英里处推进

translation.en: Tell the strike group commander
that he's not to engage unless fired on first.
translation.zh:
-不要开火 除非对方先开火
-是的 长官

translation.en: Yes, sir! Mr. Secretary?
Tom Banachek. I'm with Sector Seven,
translation.zh: 我是第七部的汤姆巴纳切

translation.en: Advanced Research Division.
Never heard of it. I'm a little busy, Tom. I think you can see that.
translation.zh: 没听说 你能看出我在忙

translation.en: Sit rep! Talk to me!
translation.zh:
状况汇报？ -跟我解释！
-整个房间的设施瘫痪

translation.en: The whole room's gone down, sir.
translation.zh:
-跟我解释！
-整个房间的设施瘫痪

translation.en: I can see that!
The virus was coded to shut us down.
General? I'll take a seat.
What do you mean, "shut us down"?
translation.zh:
-让我们全面瘫痪？
-他们用我们的网络

translation.en: They used our network to spread out to the whole world.
translation.zh:
-让我们全面瘫痪？
-他们用我们的网络 散播

translation.en: The blackout's global.
We have no communications, satellite and land lines are dead.
translation.zh: 卫星 和地面的通讯完全中断

translation.en: You mean to tell me that I cannot pick up this telephone and call my family?
translation.zh: 就连给家人 打电话都不行？

translation.en: Mr. Secretary? I'm here under direct order from the President.
translation.zh: 部长大人 我奉总统之命前来

translation.en: You really need to see what I have in the case.
translation.zh: 你要看看我提包里的东西

translation.en: BANACHEK: You'll have to accept that there are certain things
translation.zh: 先接受你目前 还不明白的东西

translation.en: you won't understand right away.
Sector Seven is a special-access division of the government
translation.zh: 第七部是政府的 机密部门

translation.en: convened in secret under President Hoover 80 years ago.
translation.zh: 由胡佛总统当年秘密设置

translation.en: You may remember NASA JPL lost the Beagle 2 Mars Rover.
translation.zh: 你也许记得宇航局的 小猎犬二号事件

translation.en: We told them to report the mission a complete failure.
translation.zh:
我们让他们向当局报道
那次任务完全失败

translation.en: It wasn't.
Beagle 2 transmitted 13 seconds.
translation.zh: 小猎犬二号传送了13秒钟信号

translation.en: This was classified above top secret.
MAN: EDA ended at 170 hours, 48 minutes.
translation.zh:
所有系统运作正常
电子数据在170小时 48分钟结束

translation.en: More than just a pile of Martian rocks.
This is the image from Mars.
Here's the image your Special Ops team was able to retrieve
translation.zh: 是你们特种兵基地 受袭后找到的图像

translation.en: from the base attack.
We believe they are of the same exoskeletal type,
translation.zh: 我们相信他们属同一类型

translation.en: and obviously not Russian or North Korean.
translation.zh: 很显然不是俄国或朝鲜人

translation.en: Are we talking about an invasion?
We intercepted the message from your Special Ops team.
translation.zh: 我们从你的特种兵 截取了消息

translation.en: These things can be hurt by our weapons and now they know it.
translation.zh: 我们的武器对他们有杀伤力 他们知道

translation.en: That's why the virus shut us down,
so we can't coordinate against their next attack,
translation.zh: 无法对抗他们的下一轮进攻

translation.en: which I would bet my ridiculous government salary is coming soon.
translation.zh: 我用我微薄的薪水做赌注 他们绝对会攻击

translation.en: Get word to our fleet commanders over the National Guard frequency.
translation.zh: 通过全国警卫频率 公告全国

translation.en: It's a shortwave radio channel.
It might be still working.
Tell them to turn their ships around and come home. ASAP!
translation.zh: 让直升机马上调头回家 越快越好

translation.en: And inform all commands to prepare for imminent attack.
translation.zh: 通知所有司令部 准备应付大敌入侵

translation.en: Captain Lennox, we need you and your team to come with us right now!
translation.zh: 莱诺克上尉 你和你的组员马上跟我们

translation.en: She's in here.
What's going on?
You're coming with me.
You're going to be my advisor.
Me, too?
Who's this?
He's my advisor. He comes, too.
So... What'd they get you for?
I bought a car. Turned out to be an alien robot.
translation.zh:
我买了一辆车
后来才知道是一辆外星人机器人

translation.en: Wow.
Who knew?
COMMANDO: Make a hole! Watch your back!
Please, let this work.
Fire it up, Optimus.
The code.
The code on these glasses indicates the All Spark is 230 miles from here.
translation.zh: 眼镜上的密码显示 火种源距离这里370公里

translation.en: I sense the Decepticons are getting ready to mobilize.
translation.zh:
霸天虎肯定早就做好准备
全军总动员

translation.en: They must know it's here, as well.
translation.zh: 他们肯定也知道在这里

translation.en: What about Bumblebee? We can't just leave him to die
translation.zh: 大黄蜂呢？我们不能看着他死

translation.en: and become some human experiment!
OPTIMUS: He'll die in vain if we don't accomplish our mission.
translation.zh:
他会白白死去
如果我们不完成此次任务

translation.en: Bumblebee is a brave soldier. This is what he would want.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂是勇敢的战士 他一定希望我们胜利

translation.en: Why are we fighting to save the humans?
They're a primitive and violent race.
Were we so different?
translation.zh: 我们难道与他们不同吗？

translation.en: They're a young species. They have much to learn.
translation.zh:
他们是非常年轻的物种
还有很多要学

translation.en: But I've seen goodness in them.
translation.zh: 但我看到了他们善良的一面

translation.en: Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.
translation.zh: 自由是所有感知生灵的权利

translation.en: You all know there's only one way to end this war.
translation.zh: 你们只知道一种办法能结束战争

translation.en: We must destroy the Cube.
translation.zh: 我们一定要摧毁立方体

translation.en: If all else fails, I will unite it with the spark in my chest.
translation.zh:
如果全军覆没 我将用我胸中的
火种与之结合

translation.en: That's suicide.
The Cube is raw power. It could destroy you both.
translation.zh: 立方体是自然力 能摧毁你们俩人

translation.en: A necessary sacrifice to bring peace to this planet.
translation.zh:
为了给这个星球带来和平
应作出必要的牺牲

translation.en: We cannot let the humans pay for our mistakes.
translation.zh: 不能让人类为我们的错误付出代价

translation.en: It's been an honor serving with you all.
translation.zh: 与你们共事是我的荣耀

translation.en: Autobots, roll out! We rolling!
EPPS: Team attention! Present arms!
At ease. Captain, Sergeant. Got your intel. Excellent work.
translation.zh:
稍息！上尉 中士 -我接到了你们的情报 好样的
-谢谢长官

translation.en: Thank you, sir. What about the gunships?
They're being retrofitted with sabot rounds now.
If they hit us again, we'll be ready for them.
translation.zh: 他们要是再来我们有备无患

translation.en: But it won't do us much good
translation.zh: 如果没有 全球通讯联络我们无法取胜

translation.en: if we can't get world communications back up.
translation.zh: 全球通讯联络我们无法取胜

translation.en: Hey, kid.
I think we got off to a bad start, huh?
translation.zh: 我们从一开始就是错误

translation.en: You must be hungry?
You want a latte? HoHo? Double venti macchiato?
Where's my car?
Son, I need you to listen to me very carefully.
translation.zh: 小伙子 我要你给我听好了

translation.en: People can die here.
We need to know everything you know.
translation.zh: 我要你说出所知的一切

translation.en: We need to know it now. Okay.
But first, I'll take my car, my parents.
translation.zh: 首先 我要拿回我的车和父母亲

translation.en: Maybe you should write that down.
Oh, and her juvie record. That's got to be gone.
translation.zh: 还有她的案底 也要消除 永远消除

translation.en: Like, forever.
translation.zh: 也要消除 永远消除

translation.en: Come with me. We'll talk about your car.
translation.zh: 跟我来 我们来讨论你的车

translation.en: Thank you.
The man's an extortionist.
translation.zh: 这小子明明在趁火打劫

translation.en: SIMMONS: All right, here's the situation.
You've all had direct contact with the NBEs. NBEs?
Non-Biological Extraterrestrials.
Try and keep up with the acronyms.
What you're about to see is totally classified.
translation.zh: 你们将要看到的完全机密

translation.en: Dear God. What is this?
BANACHEK: We think when he made his approach over the north pole,
translation.zh: 我们认为他们 从北极攻入地球

translation.en: our gravitational field screwed up his telemetry.
translation.zh: 我们的重力场破坏了他的遥测法

translation.en: He crashed in the ice, probably a few thousand years ago.
translation.zh: 他几千年前 在冰上撞毁

translation.en: We shipped him here to this facility in 1934.
translation.zh: 我们在1934年将它运到这里

translation.en: SIMMONS: We call him NBE One.
SAM: Well, sir, I don't mean to correct you on everything you think you know,
translation.zh:
-我们称之为NBE-1
-我不是故意… 挑你毛病

translation.en: but, I mean, that's Megatron.
He's the leader of the Decepticons.
He's been in cryostasis since 1935.
translation.zh: 自1935年起 就被冷冻保存

translation.en: Your great-great-grandfather
made one of the greatest discoveries
in the history of mankind.
Fact is, you're looking at the source of the modern age,
translation.zh: 你们看到的是现代化的来源

translation.en: the microchip, lasers, spaceflight, cars,
translation.zh: 微芯片 镭射 太空船 汽车

translation.en: all reverse-engineered by studying him.
translation.zh: 所有利用逆转工程都要研究他

translation.en: NBE One. That's what we call it.
And you didn't think the United States military might need to know
translation.zh: 你们地下室冷冻 外星机器人

translation.en: that you're keeping a hostile alien robot frozen in the basement?
translation.zh:
外星机器人 -竟不通知军方？
-至此

translation.en: Until these events, we had no credible threat to national security.
translation.zh:
-竟不通知军方？
-至此 我们对国家安全毫无造成威胁

translation.en: Well, you got one now.
So why Earth? SAM: It's the All Spark.
All Spark? What is that?
Well, yeah, they came here looking for some sort of cube-looking thing.
Anyway, Mr. NBE One here, AKA Megatron,
translation.zh: NBE-1先生 也就是威震天

translation.en: that's what they call him,
who's pretty much the harbinger of death, wants to use the Cube
to transform human technology to take over the universe.
translation.zh: 转换人类科技 以控制宇宙

translation.en: That's their plan.
And you're sure about that? Yeah.
You guys know where it is, don't you?
Follow me.
SIMMONS: You're about to see our crown jewel.
translation.zh: 你将看到我们的宝中之宝

translation.en: TOM: Carbon dating puts the Cube here around 10,000 BC.
translation.zh: 碳定年鉴定立方体 大约在公元前一万年

translation.en: The first Seven didn't find it until 1913.
translation.zh: 七名先驱 七名先驱直到1913年才发现

translation.en: They knew it was alien because of the matching hieroglyphics on the Cube
translation.zh: 他们知道这来自外星 立方体上的象形文字

translation.en: as well as NBE One.
President Hoover had the dam built around it.
translation.zh: 胡佛在它的周围建造了大坝

translation.en: Four football fields thick of concrete.
translation.zh: 四个足球场厚的混凝土

translation.en: A perfect way to hide its energy from being detected by anyone
translation.zh: 隐藏其能量… 不被人发现

translation.en: or any alien species on the outside.
translation.zh: 不被人发现 或被任何外星人发现

translation.en: Wait, back up. You said the dam hides the Cube's energy.
translation.zh: 等等 你说大坝 是为了藏能量立方体

translation.en: What kind exactly? TOM: Good question.
Please step inside. They have to lock us in.
translation.zh: 进去 要锁我们在里面

translation.en: Oh, wow.
What's that? Freddy Krueger done been up in here or something?
translation.zh: 里面关了 冷血杀手克鲁戈吗？

translation.en: Oh, no, man. Freddy Krueger have four blades, man.
(SNARLS) That's only three. That's Wolverine!
translation.zh: 他只有三个 是狼人

translation.en: Right? That's Wolverine! That's very funny.
Anybody have any mechanical devices?
BlackBerry? Key alarm? Cell phone? I got a phone.
Nokias are real nasty.
You've got to respect the Japanese.
They know the way of the samurai.
Nokia's from Finland.
translation.zh: 是的 诺基亚是芬兰产品

translation.en: Yes, but he's, you know, a little strange. He's a little strange.
translation.zh: 不错 但是 你知道 他有点怪

translation.en: SIMMONS: We're able to take the Cube radiation
translation.zh: 我们可以接受立方体的辐射

translation.en: and funnel it into that box.
Mean little sucker, huh?
That thing is freaky!
Kind of like the itty-bitty Energizer Bunny from hell, huh?
translation.zh: 好像地狱里跑出的干电池兔宝宝

translation.en: He's breaking the box.
COMMANDO: Go! Go! Go!
Move!
Gentlemen, they know the Cube is here.
Banachek. What's going on? Well, the NBE One hangar has lost power...
What? ...and the backup generator
is just not gonna cut it. Do you have an arms room?
translation.zh:
-能力不足
-你们是否有武器室？

translation.en: Megatron! Megatron! Megatron!
Get everyone to the NBE One chamber now!
The lights are out! Move it! Move it!
Let's go!
They're popping our generators!
translation.zh: 他们要摧毁我们的发电机！

translation.en: Megatron melting!
MAN ON PA: 16502. We're losing pressure.
Stand by! Set!
We're losing pressure!
The cryogenic system is failing! We're losing NBE One!
translation.zh: 低温系统将失效 我们会失去NBE-1

translation.en: Forty millimeter sabot rounds on that table!
translation.zh: 四十毫米发射器在那边！

translation.en: SOLDIER: That's good. Get all the ammo you got.
Everything you can carry. Bring it.
You got to take me to my car. You have to take me to my car.
He's gonna know what to do with the Cube.
translation.zh:
带我去找我的车
他知道应该怎么办

translation.en: Your car? It's confiscated. Then unconfiscate it.
translation.zh:
-你的车被没收了
-重新发还给我

translation.en: We do not know what will happen if we let it near this thing!
translation.zh: 我们不知会发生什么事！

translation.en: You don't know. Maybe you know, but I don't know.
You just wanna sit here and wait and see what happens?
I have people's lives at stake here, young man.
translation.zh: 年轻人 这里的人生命都有危险

translation.en: Take him to his car!
Drop it.
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
Drop your weapon, soldier.
translation.zh: 你放下武器 当兵的

translation.en: There's an alien war going on and you're gonna shoot me?
translation.zh: 我们遇到外星人的入侵

translation.en: You know, we didn't ask to be here.
translation.zh:
-我们不是自己要求来此
-我命令你遵守…

translation.en: I'm ordering you under S-Seven executive jurisdiction.
S-Seven don't exist. Right. And we don't take orders from people that don't exist.
translation.zh:
-第七处不存在
-我们不接受不存在人的命令

translation.en: I'm gonna count to five. Okay.
KELLER: Simmons? Yes, sir?
I'd do what he says.
Losing's really not an option for these guys.
All right. Okay.
Hey, you want to lay the fate of the world on the kid's Camaro?
translation.zh: 你要让世界命运 掌握在这小子的雪佛莱手上

translation.en: That's cool.
translation.zh: 掌握在这小子的雪佛莱手上

translation.en: Stop! You got to stop! Stop! Stop! Stop!
No, no, stop, stop, stop! Let him go! Let him go!
Are you okay?
They didn't hurt you, right?
Listen to me. The Cube is here
translation.zh: 听我说 立方体在这里

translation.en: and the Decepticons are coming.
No, no, don't worry about them. They're okay. Right?
They're not gonna hurt you.
Just back up a little bit. He's friendly. He's fine.
translation.zh: 往后站 他非常友善

translation.en: Okay, come on. Put the guns down. They're not gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: 把枪放下 他们不会伤害你

translation.en: Here, come with me. I'm gonna take you to the All Spark.
translation.zh: 我们带你们去找火种源

translation.en: Okay, here we go. He doing something. He doing something.
translation.zh: 好了 他在变形 在变形

translation.en: Oh, my God.
WOMAN: Message from Starfleet, Captain.
MAN: Let's get to it.
translation.zh: 我们开始 储藏间里的威震天

translation.en: He's right. We stay here, we're screwed with Megatron in the other hangar.
Mission City is 22 miles away.
We're gonna sneak that Cube out of here
and we're gonna hide it somewhere in the city.
Good! Right.
But we cannot make a stand without the Air Force.
This place must have some kind of radio link!
translation.zh: 这里肯定有某种无线电通讯

translation.en: Yes. Shortwave, CB. Right, yes.
Sir, you got to figure out some way to get word out to them. Let's move!
translation.zh: 您必须想办法把消息传出去

translation.en: In the alien archive, sir!
The alien... There's an old Army radio console.
Will it work? Anything's possible!
Did you see that...
LENNOX: All right, Sam, get it in the car!
Mr. Secretary! Get our birds in the air.
When we get to the city, we're gonna find a radio,
and I'll have Epps vector them in, okay? KELLER: Affirmative!
MAN ON PA: Warning! NBE One cryo-containment failing.
Check that backup system!
MAN: The cryo's failing! You got to bump up the cryo!
translation.zh: 温度在下降 提高温度 温度在下降

translation.en: The cryo's failing!
translation.zh: 提高温度 温度在下降

translation.en: MAN 2: Come on! Get out of here!
Heads up! Look out!
Set a perimeter around the yellow vehicle!
This way, this way, this way!
Up there! Let's go!
I am Megatron!
SAM: The Cube's okay? Yeah, it's fine. Well, put the seat belt on.
Pour it on him!
STARSCREAM: I live to serve you, Lord Megatron.
translation.zh: 我生来就为服侍你 主子威震天

translation.en: Where is the Cube?
The humans have taken it.
You fail me yet again, Starscream. Get them!
translation.zh:
你又一次让我失望 红蜘蛛！
抓住他们！

translation.en: Over here, sir!
translation.zh: 这里 长官！ 这里

translation.en: Give me a minute. Give me a minute.
Come to me, Maxwell, come to me. Plugged in there.
We're hot! We're live! Where are the mikes?
translation.zh:
-接通了！我们有救了！
-话筒在哪里？

translation.en: Mikes?
This doesn't work without mikes, Simmons. No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
KELLER: Let's find them.
Kid, get in the chair! Just get in the chair, all right?
Okay, I'll sit. I'll sit. They steal everything out of this place.
translation.zh: 他们把这里的东西都偷光了

translation.en: How do we get the signal out? How do we call the Air Force?
translation.zh: 我们怎样发射信号 怎么联络空军？

translation.en: Glen? Huh?
Can you hotwire this computer to transmit a tone through the radio?
translation.zh: 你能不能把这台电脑 重走线 连接无线电？

translation.en: What good is that? Morse code! You can use this to transmit it through that!
Okay, I'll do it!
Turn it around. Okay, let's see.
Simmons, I need a screwdriver!
translation.zh: 西蒙斯 我需要螺丝刀

translation.en: There's Optimus.
GLEN: Almost done.
What the hell was that?
Barricade the door!
KELLER: Get something. Watch out!
Six, five, four, six, three.
translation.zh: 六 五 四 六 三

translation.en: Here! Put some rounds in!
Master search.
I got it! We're transmitting!
Send exactly what I say!
Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
Burn, you little sucker! Burn!
"This is Defense Secretary Keller." Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 我是国防部长 凯勒

translation.en: "Get me NORTHCOM commander."
Whoa! Whoa!
What was that?
Authenticate emergency action. Blackbird 1195...
Sir, I have an authenticated air strike order from Sec Def.
translation.zh: 我受到了防长发出的空袭命令

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. What?
It's the same cop! Block them, block them, block them.
translation.zh: 是同样的警察！ 堵住他们

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Cool, Mom!
This is so not good.
He's behind the pillar!
GLEN: Shoot that mother... Maggie, cover fire!
translation.zh:
-打死那个该死的
-麦琪 开枪掩护！

translation.en: GLEN: It's the Air Force! They're responding!
Sucker, burn!
Oh, shit!
Yes! They're sending F-22s to the city!
translation.zh: 好啊 他们要派F-22来城市！

translation.en: PILOT ON RADIO: Raptors, let's scramble, scramble, scramble.
PILOT 2: Strike and Dark Star roll call.
translation.zh: 猛击黑星 汇报状况

translation.en: PILOT 3: Looking out the right side.
PILOT 4: Push to Kill Box One Alpha...
Come on, let's go! Mount up!
SOLDIER: Move out! Move out! Go! Go!
Here, I got shortwave radios.
Wait. What am I supposed to do with these?
Well, use them! It's all we got!
translation.zh: 联络外界！我们只有这个！

translation.en: EPPS: This is like RadioShack dinosaur radios or something, man.
translation.zh: 这玩意儿就像 古董无线电

translation.en: I'm only gonna get 20 or 30 miles out of these things.
translation.zh: 只能发送信号四五十公里远

translation.en: Are there any aircraft orbiting the city?
translation.zh: 城市上空有没有飞机环绕？

translation.en: All right, I want planes for air cover and get Black Hawks on station
translation.zh: 我要飞机空中掩护 黑鹰取出…

translation.en: to extract that Cube. You got it?
translation.zh: 能量立方体 明白吗？

translation.en: Air Force has arrived! Pop smoke!
Raptor, Raptor, do you copy?
translation.zh: 肉食鸟 你能收到吗？

translation.en: EPPS: We have you visual.
Green smoke is the mark.
Provide air cover and vector Black Hawks for extraction.
translation.zh: 提供空中掩护引开黑鹰

translation.en: It's Starscream!
Please tell me you copy.
Back up! Take cover! Bumblebee!
No, no, no, no, no! Move!
Back up! Back up! LENNOX: Retreat! Fall back!
IRONHIDE: Incoming!
LENNOX: Anybody hurt? Everyone okay?
translation.zh: 有谁受伤？大家都没事吧？

translation.en: SOLDIER: Clear the area!
(BUMBLEBEE GROANING) SAM: Oh, my God.
Bumblebee? No. Your legs!
Your legs.
Here. Here, back, back, back, back! You all right?
Please get up. Bumblebee? Get up!
translation.zh: 请起来！大黄蜂 起来!

translation.en: Ratchet!
What the hell was that? What are you talking about?
What do you mean, what am I talking about? They shot at us!
translation.zh:
-那到底是什么？
-你到底在说什么？ -他们向我们开枪
-F-22不能超低飞行！

translation.en: F-22 pilots would never fly below buildings.
translation.zh:
-他们向我们开枪
-F-22不能超低飞行！

translation.en: That's alien. That ain't friendly!
You got to get up. You're okay. You're okay.
Come on!
PILOT: Army Black Hawk inbound to your location. Over.
Alpha 273 degrees, 10 miles.
November Victor, 1.2 clicks north.
Move out! Let's go!
SOLDIER: Let's go! Move!
I'm not gonna leave you.
Come on, Decepticon punk!
Oh, my God!
Concentrate your fire!
Come on. Come on.
Megatron!
OPTIMUS: It's Megatron! Retreat! Move! Fall back!
translation.zh: 是威震天！撤退 撤退

translation.en: Fall back!
Get our guys out of the way! Get out of here! Go!
Get them out of the buggy! Move out!
EPPS: We need air cover down here now!
Sam, help me with this.
JAZZ: That all you got, Megatron? Come here, little cretin.
translation.zh:
-威震天！就有这么大本事？
-过来 小傻子

translation.en: You want a piece of me? You want a piece?
No! I want two!
LENNOX: What's going on?
Sir! That tank thing's getting back up.
translation.zh: 长官 坦克怪物有后备支援

translation.en: Oh, these things just don't die.
translation.zh: 这些家伙怎么都打不死

translation.en: Oh, we're so dead.
Wrap it around the head. Sam!
Right there. Okay.
SAM: And take that and wrap it around
the base and then put it around his neck.
Okay? Epps, get those Black Hawks here!
translation.zh: 艾普斯 让黑鹰过来

translation.en: That building.
Okay. What?
All right, I can't leave my guys back there, so here, take this flare.
translation.zh: 我不能离开战士 拿着信号弹

translation.en: Okay, there's a tall, white building with statues on top.
translation.zh: 那边有白色大厦 顶上有塑像

translation.en: Go to the roof. Set the flare. No.
translation.zh: 去楼顶 用信号弹向直升机打信号

translation.en: Signal the chopper and set the flare. No, no. I can't do this!
translation.zh:
用信号弹向直升机打信号 -我不会！
-你现在是战士了

translation.en: Listen to me! You're a soldier now!
All right? I need you to take this Cube.
Get it into military hands while we hold them off,
or a lot of people are gonna die.
You got to go. You got to go. No, I'm not leaving.
You need to go. Go. No, I'm not leaving
till I get Bumblebee out of here, okay?
translation.zh: 我要带着大黄蜂一起走！

translation.en: Army Black Hawk requested.
Immediate evac for civilian boy with precious cargo.
translation.zh:
马上疏散所有平民 他带有珍贵物件
正在楼顶点燃烧弹

translation.en: Headed to rooftop marked by flare.
translation.zh:
他带有珍贵物件
正在楼顶点燃烧弹

translation.en: Sam, we will protect you. Okay.
LENNOX: Epps, where are those planes?
Sam!
No matter what happens,
I'm really glad I got in that car with you.
translation.zh: 我都高兴那天上了你的车

translation.en: Sam! Get to the building! Move!
MEGATRON: Decepticons, attack! Hit it!
RATCHET: Cover fire! SOLDIER: Move to cover!
Watch out!
LENNOX: Girl, get that tow truck out of here!
I'm going! I'm going!
Get out of here now!
Megatron!
Prime.
Humans don't deserve to live.
They deserve to choose for themselves.
Then you will die with them!
translation.zh: 那你就跟他们一起去死！

translation.en: Join them in extinction!
Keep moving, Sam!
Don't stop!
Sam, get to the building!
Give me that Cube, boy!
Did that jerk just dent my car?
You're not gonna get me. You're not gonna get me!
MEGATRON: I smell you, boy!
Maggot!
Oh, no!
I'll drive! You shoot!
This isn't going well!
Shoot! Shoot!
Nice shot.
SOLDIER: That tank is definitely dead now.
LENNOX: All right, let's go! We got business!
Hey! I'm over here!
We've got the boy.
Watch out!
Missile!
Hang on, Sam!
No! No!
Is it fear or courage that compels you, fleshling?
translation.zh:
究竟是恐惧还是勇气
在迫使你 皮肉之身？

translation.en: Give me the All Spark and you may live to be my pet.
translation.zh: 交出火种源你就能活着当我的宠物

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no.
I'm never giving you this All Spark!
Oh, so unwise.
I got you, boy.
Hold on to the Cube!
Disgusting.
Sam?
You risked your life to protect the Cube.
No sacrifice,
no victory. If I cannot defeat Megatron,
translation.zh:
-就没有胜利
-如果我无法击败威震天

translation.en: you must push the Cube into my chest.
translation.zh: 你把立方体塞进我的胸膛

translation.en: I will sacrifice myself to destroy it.
translation.zh: 我牺牲自己也要摧毁它

translation.en: Get behind me.
It's you and me, Megatron.
translation.zh: 现在你跟我打 威震天

translation.en: No, it's just me, Prime.
translation.zh: 不 得势的只是我 擎天柱

translation.en: OPTIMUS: At the end of this day, one shall stand, one shall fall.
translation.zh: 你我之间只有一个能活 一个必死

translation.en: You still fight for the weak! That is why you lose!
translation.zh:
你还在为弱者征战！
所以你注定失败！

translation.en: Fighter jets in 60 seconds.
We got friendlies mixed with bad guys. Targets will be marked.
translation.zh: 我们有盟友也有坏人 目标将被锁定

translation.en: Hey.
Bring the rain. All right?
translation.zh: 来吧 干掉这些家伙

translation.en: All right, let's kill these things.
Move, move, move! Remember, aim low.
translation.zh: 快走！ 瞄准低处 他们胸部以下很弱

translation.en: Armor's weak under the chest.
translation.zh: 瞄准低处 他们胸部以下很弱

translation.en: EPPS: Target marked. Still waiting.
PILOT: Time on target, 20 seconds.
F-22s, we're still waiting.
Move out!
Incoming!
PILOT: Weapons armed. Status green.
Run! Move!
Second wave's on approach.
What is that? Break off!
Copy. It's either a massive amount of...
Two, get a lock! Pop that guy!
translation.zh: 二号 锁定目标！干掉他！

translation.en: Stay on him. Keep him in your sights.
translation.zh: 盯死对方 别让他跑掉

translation.en: Take him out!
Two's down!
I'll kill you!
Mine! All Spark!
Sam! Put the Cube in my chest! Now!
translation.zh: 山姆 把火种源插进我胸膛！快！

translation.en: Sam!
No, Sam!
Hold up.
OPTIMUS: You left me no choice, brother.
translation.zh: 你让我别无选择 兄弟

translation.en: Sam, I owe you my life.
translation.zh: 山姆 你救了我的命

translation.en: We are in your debt.
translation.zh: 我们会永远记得你们的大恩

translation.en: Prime, we couldn't save him.
translation.zh: 擎天柱 我们救不了他

translation.en: Aw, Jazz.
We lost a great comrade
translation.zh: 我们失去了伟大的战友

translation.en: but gained new ones.
Thank you, all of you.
You honor us with your bravery.
translation.zh: 你们用勇敢行为救了我们

translation.en: Permission to speak, sir?
Permission granted, old friend.
You speak now?
I wish to stay with the boy.
translation.zh: 我想留下跟这个男孩在一起

translation.en: If that is his choice.
Yes.
Gentlemen, the President has ordered Sector Seven be terminated
translation.zh: 先生们 总统命令 第七部就此解散

translation.en: and the remains of the dead aliens disposed of.
translation.zh: 将外星人的尸体适当处理

translation.en: The Laurentian Abyss is seven miles below sea level,
translation.zh: 劳伦海渊位于海下26公里

translation.en: deepest place on our planet.
The massive depth and pressure there,
coupled with subfreezing temperatures,
would crush and entomb them,
translation.zh: 是将霸天虎粉身碎骨的理想葬身之处

translation.en: leaving no evidence.
OPTIMUS: With the All Spark gone,
we cannot return life to our planet.
translation.zh: 我们无法返回我们的星球

translation.en: And fate has yielded its reward,
a new world to call home.
translation.zh: 让我们在新世界里安家

translation.en: We live among its people now, hiding in plain sight,
translation.zh: 我们生活在人类中 乔装打扮

translation.en: but watching over them in secret,
waiting, protecting.
I have witnessed their capacity for courage.
translation.zh: 我目睹了他们宽广的心胸

translation.en: And though we are worlds apart,
translation.zh: 尽管我们来自不同的世界

translation.en: like us, there's more to them than meets the eye.
translation.zh: 就像我们 人不可貌相

translation.en: I am Optimus Prime
and I send this message to any surviving Autobots
translation.zh: 我发这则信息给所有汽车人

translation.en: taking refuge among the stars.
We are here.
We are waiting.
Can you shed any light on the recent, so-called alien activity in the area?
translation.zh:
你们能否多谈一些 关于外星人最近
在这一带活动的情况？

translation.en: Do you know what? I think that
translation.zh: 其实 要我说嘛 如果有外星人来

translation.en: if there was some sort of an alien
infestation... Yeah.
They, the government, would be the first to let you know.
translation.zh: 政府 应该通知我们

translation.en: The government would let us know.
I mean, this is America. Yeah.
You know, that's how we know we live in a free land,
translation.zh: 所以我们才知道这是自由世界

translation.en: because there's no secrets.
They'd say, "Hey! Duck and cover."
translation.zh: 大家就会赶快找地方躲起来

translation.en: Your head is kind of a different size than it is on television.
translation.zh: 你跟电视上 脑袋大小不一样
